title: The Wales and Borders Radiocarbon Dating Database
biography: The Wales and Borders database (Burrow, S 2018. ‘Radiocarbon Dating in Wales: The State of the Nation’. Archaeology in Wales 56: 107–12) contains detailed information on over 7,500 radiocarbon dates published in over 2,000 books and articles. This data was remixed by Data Cymru in 2020.

title: Notable Welsh Rugby Union Players
biography: This dataset contains information about some of Wales' most notable rugby union players including their position, the teams they play/played for and their date and place of birth. This data was compiled by Data Cymru in 2020 based on data published on Wikidata.

title: Notable British Female Scientists
biography: This dataset contains information about some of Britain's most notable female scientists including their place of birth, where they were educated and the awards they received. This data was compiled by Data Cymru in 2020 based on data published on Wikidata.

title: UFO Sightings Reported in Wales 1997-2009
biography: This is a list of UFO sightings in Wales between 1997 and 2009, as reported to the Ministry of Defence. This data was downloaded in 2020 by Data Cymru from www.data.gov.uk.

title: Slugs and Snails in Wales
biography: This dataset contains 5,000 records about slugs and snails found in Wales. This data was compiled by Data Cymru in 2020 based on data published on Wikidata.

title: Wales Women's Football Squad
biography: This chart focuses on members of the Welsh women's football squad (the A team) and the teams they play for. This data was curated by Data Cymru in 2020. Source: Wikipedia.

title: Characters in Under Milk Wood
biography: This is a chart where each node is a character in Dylan Thomas' Under Milk Wood, and each link indicates that they are connected in a scene. One character may speak to the other, or may dream of another or may receive a message from another. This is called character co-occurrence. This data was curated by Data Cymru in 2020.

title: Mark Drakeford Speeches
biography: Mark Drakeford was the leader of the Welsh Labour party. He was nominated by Assembly Ministers (AMs) as First Minister designate on 12 December 2018 and his nomination was approved by HM The Queen. This dataset is a compilation of his contribution to plenary sessions from his acceptance speech for the following few months. The majority of his contributions are as part of "Questions to the First Minister". The proceedings of the Senedd are translated from whichever language the speaker used. This data was downloaded by Data Cymru in 2020 from the Senedd official proceedings.

title: Rhodri Morgan Speeches
biography: Rhodri Morgan was the leader of the Welsh Labour party and First Secretary (later renamed First Minister) of Wales from 2000-2009. He was, as of 2020, the longest-serving First Minister of Wales. This dataset is a compilation of his contribution to plenary sessions from his acceptance speech and for the following few months. The majority of his contributions are as part of "Questions to the First Secretary". The proceedings of the Senedd are translated from whichever language the speaker used. This data was downloaded by Data Cymru in 2020 from the Senedd official proceedings.

title: UFO Sightings Reported in Wales 1997-2009
biography: This dataset contains the descriptions of UFO sightings in Wales between 1997 and 2009, as reported to the Ministry of Defence. This data was downloaded in 2020 by Data Cymru from www.data.gov.uk.

title: State of the Union Addresses - Barack Obama
biography: Annual State of the Union addresses made by Barack Obama 2010-2016. This data was compiled by Giles Bullen from Barack Obama's web archives.

title: State of the Union Addresses - George W. Bush
biography: Annual State of the Union addresses made by George W. Bush 2002-2008. This data was compiled by Giles Bullen from George W. Bush's web archives.

title: UN General Assembly Addresses - Ban-ki Moon
biography: Annual United Nations General Assembly Addresses made by Ban-ki Moon 2007-2016. Note that some parts of these speeches were made in French so you will see French words. This data was compiled by Giles Bullen from the UN website.

title: UN General Assembly Addresses - António Guterres
biography: Annual United Nations General Assembly Addresses made by António Guterres 2017-2018. This data was compiled by Giles Bullen from the UN website.

biography: These are lyrics from many or Beyonce's songs. They were scraped from lyrics123.net by Rahul Bhargava in 2014.

title: Titanic Passengers
biography: This is a manifest of passengers from on the doomed Titanic cruise. It was downloaded from the Kaggle Machine Learning Challenge in 2014 by Catherine D'Ignazio.

title: UFO Sightings in Massachusetts
biography: This is a list of UFO sightings in Massachusetts, as reported by individuals to the National UFO Reporting Center. They were downloaded in 2014 by Catherine D'Ignazio.

title: Letra da Anitta
biography: Essas são letras de músicas do Anitta. Foram tiradas do site lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava em 2014.

biography: Essas são letras de músicas da Marisa Monte. Foram tiradas do site lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava em 2014.

title: Altura y Peso de Personas entre 6 - 16 años en los EEUU
biography: Eso es una lista de información de salúd de un variedad de personas in los EEUU.

title: El tiempo de San José, Costa Rica, en 2016
biography: Esta contiene una historia del tiempo in San José, Costa Rica en el año 2016.

title: Estatísticas dos Times Brasileiros da Serie A
Locais turísticos em Rio de Janeiro
Domínios de internet do governo no Brasil
Letras do Chico Buarque
biography: Essas são letras de músicas da Chico Buarque. Foram tiradas do site lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava em 2014.

title: La Letra de Maná
biography: Essas son letras de caniones de Maná. Fueron copiado de sitio lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava en 2014.

biography: Essas son letras de caniones de Paulina Rubio. Fueron copiado de sitio lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava en 2014.

biography: Essas son letras de caniones de Ricky Martin. Fueron copiado de sitio lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava en 2014.

title: La Letra de Shakira
biography: Essas son letras de caniones de Shakira. Fueron copiado de sitio lyrics123.net por Rahul Bhargava en 2014.

title: Los Discursos de Fidel Castro 1959
biography: Essas son discursos de Fidel Castro en 1959. Fueron copiado de sitio LANIC por Catherine D'Ignazio en 2015.

title: Los Discursos de Fidel Castro 2000 - 2008
biography: Essas son discursos de Fidel Castro entre 2000 - 2008. Fueron copiado de sitio LANIC por Catherine D'Ignazio en 2015.

title: Les Misérables Character Co-occurence
biography: This is chart where each node is a character in Les Misérables, and each link indicates that they appear in a scene together. This is called character co-occurrence. This data was downloaded by Stephen Suen in 2016 from The Stanford GraphBase.

title: Zachary's Karate Club
biography: This is chart shows a social network within a university karate club. This is a classic example in network science, used in academic papers since the mid 1970s. This version of the dataset was created by Rahul Bhargava based on the network listed on the Wikipedia entry in 2016.

title: Genealogia de Jiu Jitsu (Gracie)
biography: Este gráfico mostra quem formou quem dentro da família Gracie. Foi a família Gracie que fundou a prática de Jiu Jitsu no Brasil. O gráfico foi criado por Catherine D'Ignazio em 2016.

title: Times do membros da Seleção Brasileira da Copa
biography: Esse gráfico de rede mostra os times com os quais os membros da Seleção Brasileira tem jogado. Os pontos são os jogadores (da Seleção Brasileira da Copa do Mundo de 2014) e os times com os quais tem jogado. A linha entre os pontos quer dizer que o jogador tem jogado com esse time. Esses dados foram coletados do Wikipedia por Mariel García.

title: Los Clubes del Jugadores Argentinianos de la Mundial
biography: Esta red muestra para cuales equipos de club de fútbol los jugadores del equipo nacional han jugado. Los nodos son los jugadores (del equipo de la Copa Mundial de Argentina 2014) y sus clubes. Un enlace entre los nodos significa que el jugador ha jugado para que el club. Estos datos son captuados manualmente de Wikipedia por Mariel García.

title: People in "Trump World"
biography: This is a dataset of people in President Donald Trump's world. This data was collected, and crowdsourced, by BuzzFeed. These person-to-person links are based on research from a variety of sources. Sometimes the link indicates the person is an advisor to someone, sometimes they are business partners, etc.

title: Boston Cares Volunteer Survey
biography: Boston Cares is the largest volunteer agency in New England (USA). In 2016 they ran a survey of volunteers in their network to understand what motivates them. This data is made up of 100 responses to the question "Is there anything about your personal life, your community, or in the world that motivates you to volunteer?" These results were generously shared with us by Boston Cares.

title: United Way: Individual Challenges to Homelessness Prevention
biography: The United Way of Massachusetts Bay and Merrimack Valley surveys their agencies about a variety of challenges they face. This dataset is the response from various agencies about individual-level challenges to preventing homelesness. Agency names have been replaced with "AGENCY NAME" and other indentifying details have been removed before they shared this data set with us.

title: United Way: Environmental Challenges to Homelessness Prevention
biography: The United Way of Massachusetts Bay and Merrimack Valley surveys their agencies about a variety of challenges they face. This dataset is the response from various agencies about enfironmental challenges to preventing homelesness. Agency names have been replaced with "AGENCY NAME" and other indentifying details have been removed before they shared this data set with us.

title: The Dogs of NYC
biography: This is a database of all the dogs registeredin NYC as of 2016.  It includes animal's name, sex, age, breed, and which burough of New York City it lives in.

title: Satellites Orbitting Earth
biography: This is a database of satellites in orbit around earth as of 2017, compiled by the The Union of Concerned Scientists'. Rahul downloaded this from their website in mid 2017.

title: Trees in Somerville, MA, USA
biography: A list of all the tress in the town of Somerville, MA, USA as of Spring 2009. The city hired an arborist to visit each tree and record things like its size, health, species, location, etc. This data was scraped by a script created in 2010 by Rahul Bhargava.

title: Offentlige toiletter i Københavns Kommune
biography: Toiletter der varetages og driftes af Teknik- og Miljøforvaltningen. Tabellen indeholder oplysninger om bl.a. toilettyper (toilet, toilet med handicap adgang, bemandet, ubemandet og pissoirs), åbningstider, længde og breddegrads koordinater (geokoder).

title: Hastighedsmålinger i Aarhus 2000-2013 efter vejnavne
biography: Hvor hurtigt kører bilerne på vejene i Aarhus Kommune? Her finder du hastighedsmålinger for udvalgte veje. Regneark med de hastighedsmålinger kommunen har foretaget i perioden 2000-2013.

title: Hastighedsmålinger i Aarhus 2008-2019 efter vejnavne
biography: Hvor hurtigt kører bilerne på vejene i Aarhus Kommune? Her finder du hastighedsmålinger for udvalgte veje. Regneark med de hastighedsmålinger kommunen har foretaget i perioden 2008-2019.

title: Poul Nyrup Rasmussen - taler
biography: Poul Nyrup Rasmussens officielle taler som statsminister, perioden 25.1.1993 - 27.11.2001 - 8 år og 307 dage.

title: Anders Fogh Rasmussen - taler
biography: Anders Fogh Rasmussens officielle taler som statsminister, perioden 27.11.2001 - 05.04.2009 - 7 år og 130 dage.

title: Lars Løkke Rasmussen I - taler

title: Helle Thorning-schmidt - taler

title: Lars Løkke Rasmussen II og III

title: Les Misérables Character Co-occurence
biography: This is chart where each node is a character in Les Misérables, and each link indicates that they appear in a scene together. This is called character co-occurrence. This data was downloaded by Stephen Suen in 2016 from The Stanford GraphBase.

title: Zachary's Karate Club
biography: This is chart shows a social network within a university karate club. This is a classic example in network science, used in academic papers since the mid 1970s. This version of the dataset was created by Rahul Bhargava based on the network listed on the Wikipedia entry in 2016.

title: Cronfa Ddata Dyddio Radiocarbon  Cymru a'r Gororau
biography: Mae cronfa ddata Cymru a'r Gororau (Burrow, S 2018. ‘Radiocarbon Dating in Wales: The State of the Nation’. Archaeoleg yng Nghymru 56: 107–12) yn cynnwys gwybodaeth fanwl am fwy na 7,500 o ddyddiadau radiocarbon a gyhoeddwyd mewn dros 2,000 o lyfrau ac erthyglau. Cafodd y data hwn ei atgymysgu gan Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Chwaraewyr Rygbi Undeb Pennaf Cymru
biography: Mae'r set ddata hon yn cynnwys gwybodaeth am rai  o chwaraewyr rygbi undeb pennaf Cymru gan gynnwys eu safle, i ba timau maent/roeddent yn chwarae a dyddiad a man eu geni. Cafodd y data hwn ei grynhoi gan Data Cymru yn 2020 ar sail data a gyhoeddwyd ar Wikidata.

title: Gweld UFO a Adroddwyd Cymru 1997 a 2009
biography: Mae hon yn rhestr o ddigwyddiadau gweld UFO yng Nghymru rhwng 1997 a 2009, fel y'u hadroddwyd i'r Weinyddiaeth Amddiffyn. Cafodd y data hwn ei lawrlwytho yn 2020 gan Data Cymru o www.data.gov.uk.

title: Gwlithen a Malwod yng Nghymru
biography: Mae'r set ddata hon yn cynnwys 5,000 o gofnodion am wlithod a malwod a geir yng Nghymru. Cafodd y data hwn ei grynhoi gan Data Cymru yn 2020 ar sail data a gyhoeddwyd ar Wikidata.

title: Gyddonwyr Benyw Pennaf Prydain
biography: Mae'r set ddata hon yn cynnwys gwybodaeth am rai o wyddonwyr benyw pennaf Prydain gan gynnwys eu man geni, ble cawsant eu haddysgu a'r gwobrau a dderbyniant. Cafodd y data hwn ei grynhoi gan Data Cymru yn 2020 ar sail data a gyhoeddwyd ar Wikidata.

title: Gorkys Zygotic Mynci
biography: Mae'r siart hwn yn canolbwyntio ar aelodau band seicedelig/roc gwerin Cymreig Gorki's Zygotic Mynci ac ym mha fandiau eraill maent wedi chwarae. Cafodd y data hwn ei guradu gan Data Cymru yn 2020. Ffynhonnell: Wikipedia.

title: Gorkys Zygotic Mynci
biography: This chart focuses on the members of the Welsh psychedelic/folk rock band Gorki's Zygotic Mynci and the other bands they have played in. This data was curated by Data Cymru in 2020. Source: Wikipedia.

title: Sgwad Pêl-Droed Menywod Cymru
biography: Mae'r siart hwn yn canolbwyntio ar aelodau sgwad pêl-droed menywod Cymru (tîm A) ac i ba dimau maent yn chwarae. Cafodd y data hwn ei guradu gan Data Cymru yn 2020. Ffynhonnell: Wikipedia.

title: Cymeriadau yn Under Milk Wood
biography: Mae hwn yn siart lle mae pob nod yn gymeriad yn Under Milk Wood Dylan Thomas, ac mae pob dolen yn dangos eu bod yn gysylltiedig mewn golygfa. Bydd un cymeriad efallai'n siarad â'r llall, neu efallai'n breuddwydio am y llall neu'n derbyn neges gan gymeriad arall. Yr enw ar hyn yw cydamseriad cymeriadau. Cafodd y data hwn ei guradu gan Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Geiriau Caneuon Yws Gwynedd
biography: Dyma eiriau caneuon gan Yws Gwynedd. Rhannodd yr artist hwy â Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Geiriau Caneuon Dafydd Iwan
biography: Dyma eiriau caneuon gan Dafydd Iwan. Rhannodd yr artist hwy â Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Hwiangerddi Newydd
biography: Dyma eiriau rhai hwiangerddi Cymraeg modern. Cafodd y data hwn ei grynhoi gan Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Hen Hwiangerddi
biography: Dyma eiriau rhai hwiangerddi Cymraeg hen. Cafodd y data hwn ei grynhoi gan Data Cymru yn 2020.

title: Areithiau Mark Drakeford
biography: Mark Drakeford oedd arweinydd plaid Lafur Cymru. Cafodd ei enwebu gan Aelodau'r Cynulliad (AC) fel darpar Brif Weinidog ar 12 Rhagfyr 2018 a chafodd ei enwebiad ei gymeradwyo gan EM Y Frenhines. Mae'r set ddata hon yn grynodeb o'i gyfraniad at sesiynau llawn o'i araith dderbyn am yr ychydig fisoedd dilynol. Mae'r mwyafrif o'i gyfraniadau yn rhan o "Gwestiynau i'r Prif Weinidog". Mae trafodion y Senedd yn cael eu cyfieithu o ba iaith bynnag a ddefnyddiodd y siaradwr. Cafodd y data hwn ei lawrlwytho gan Data Cymru yn 2020 o drafodion swyddogol y Senedd.

title: Areithiau Rhodri Morgan
biography: Rhodri Morgan oedd arweinydd plaid Lafur Cymru a Phrif Ysgrifennydd (a ailenwyd wedyn yn Brif Weinidog) Cymru o 2000-2009. Ef oedd, hyd yma yn 2020, Prif Weinidog Cymru am y cyfnod hwyaf. Mae'r set ddata hon yn grynodeb o'i gyfraniad at sesiynau llawn o'i araith dderbyn am yr ychydig fisoedd dilynol. Mae'r mwyafrif o'i gyfraniadau yn rhan o "Gwestiynau i'r Prif Weinidog". Mae trafodion y Senedd yn cael eu cyfieithu o ba iaith bynnag a ddefnyddiodd y siaradwr. Cafodd y data hwn ei lawrlwytho gan Data Cymru yn 2020 o drafodion swyddogol y Senedd.

title: Gweld UFO Gwybodaeth a Adroddwyd Cymru 1997 a 2009
biography: Mae'r set ddata hon yn cynnwys y disgrifiadau o ddigwyddiadau gweld UFO yng Nghymru rhwng 1997 a 2009, fel y'u hadroddwyd i'r Weinyddiaeth Amddiffyn. Cafodd y data hwn ei lawrlwytho yn 2020 gan Data Cymru o www.data.gov.uk.
